root.name: Cosmic Spacehead
root.description: Cosmic (Linus) has just returned from planet Earth, unfortunatly no one on his home planet Linoleum believes his story about Earth, as a result he decides to return there, but this time he will take a camera in order to prove the existence of Earth. The game revolves around Cosmics attempts to acquire a camera and space ship in order to return to Earth, throughout the game the player must solve a series of puzzles in order to aquire new items, this in turn allows the player to furuther progress through the games story.Â The game world is set in a number of differnt locations on the planet, in order to travel between these locations the player must complete a short platforming section, these follow tradiional platform mechinics of progressing from one side to the other, while avoiding enemies and pits of death.
